data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 3,092 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Rasŏn.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rasŏn, North Korea
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Rasŏn that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Rasŏn, North Korea the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 3,092 believers in Rasŏn to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Deaf people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Deaf people.
Spirit, encourage the church in Rasŏn, North Korea to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 3,092 believers find a person of peace today among the 193,908 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Rasŏn hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

location.name: Rasŏn
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Mandarin, Korean, Mongol, Khalka
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Han Chinese, Mandarin (182,000), Korean (25,208,000), Mongol, Khalka (36,000)
